casebody.data:
In re Foreclosure of Friscia 246P16-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Christopher Charles Friscia, for Friscia, Christopher C., et al. Nathan J. Taylor, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Taylor, Nathan J., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of October 2016 by Defendant to Reconsider:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
